mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pet (user_id, img_path, name, age, weight, species, spec_species, gender, disease, recog_chip) VALUES (#{userId}, #{petImg}, #{petName}, #{petAge}, #{petWeight}, #{species}, #{spec_species}, #{petGender}, #{petDisease}, #{petRecog_chip})
mapper.select: select img_path from pet where user_id = #{id}
select img_path from pet where id = #{petId}
mapper.sql: id, species, age, weight, disease, name, gender, spec_species as specSpecies, recog_chip as recogChip, img_path as img
mapper.select: SELECT pd.title AS title, pd.created_at AS createdAt, pd.id AS diaryId, (SELECT di.img_path FROM diary_img di WHERE di.diary_id = pd.id LIMIT 1) AS imgPath, p.name AS petName FROM pet_diary pd JOIN pet p ON pd.pet_id = p.id WHERE pd.pet_id = #{petId};
